### Raster Data {.inverse}

- Made up of grids

- Cells or Pixels: Each cell contains a value representing information like color, temperature, elevation, etc.

- Used for elevation, weather data etc

https://r.geocompx.org/spatial-class.html#raster-data

https://www.paulamoraga.com/book-spatial/the-terra-package-for-raster-and-vector-data.html
